meanings.definition: To eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The sick child bevomited after eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: She felt nauseous and bevomited all over the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent3: The dog bevomited on the carpet, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing trash can bevomited a foul smell into the room.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride made her feel like she would bevomit at any moment.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he bevomited his lunch in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent2: She had bevomited so much that she felt weak and tired.
meanings.sent3: The baby bevomited on her new dress, causing a mini disaster.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing toilet had bevomited its contents onto the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage made her wish she had never bevomited.
